title: U.S. states with state cyber bullying laws as of November 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows State totals for 5 number of Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws.
The maximum State totals 49.0 is found at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and the minimum is found at Includes off-campus where Category Of Cyber Bullying Law is 17.0.
There is a difference of 32.0 between the maximum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and minimum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law in the x axis and State totals in the y axis.
The State totals is highest at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and lowest at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows State totals for 5 number of Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws.
The maximum State totals 49.0 is found at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and the minimum is found at Includes off-campus where Category Of Cyber Bullying Law is 17.0.
There is a difference of 32.0 between the maximum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and minimum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law in the x axis and State totals in the y axis.
The maximum State totals 49.0 is found at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and the minimum is found at Includes off-campus where Category Of Cyber Bullying Law is 17.0.
The second highest State totals is appeared to be the Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes cyber bullying or online harassment.
The difference of State totals between the highest and lowest Category Of Cyber Bullying Law is 32.0.

The Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy has the highest State totals, followed by Includes cyber bullying or online harassment, and School sanction for cyber bullying. Down to the Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus which is the lowest.
The average State totals in all 5 Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws is 40.6.
The State totals is 203.0 if we add up values of all Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws.

data.Category Of Cyber Bullying Law: Includes cyber bullying or online harassment
Criminal Sanction for cyber bullying or electronic harassment
